EmailTemplate.description: Sent to participants of Onboarding Week 1
EmailTemplate.name: OLD_04. Survey: Onboarding Week 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback Requested | Sales Effectiveness - Sales New Hire Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Feedback Is Important!
We hope you enjoyed your WEX Sales Onboarding experience. It is our goal to ensure the Global Sales Operations Training Team delivers a world class sales onboarding program. In order to continue to improve the program and meet the needs of our growing sales force, we are asking you to answer brief surveys based on your experience.
Week 1 Sales Onboarding Survey - http://wex.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_87IpoQkrglrcQu1
Contact SalesTraining@wexinc.com with any questions.
Thank You, WEX Global Sales Training
